branchCategory.name: XLA, Aluminum High Vacuum Angle Valve, Normally Closed/Bellows Seal
branchCategory.description: <p>Series XLA are high vacuum angle valves for use in industrial applications employing high vacuum and process gases. &nbsp;Common industries that may use these angle valves include semiconductor, solar and other electonics production, as well as food and pharmaceutical manufacturing. &nbsp;XLA valves are single-acting, normally closed, with a bellows seal over the shaft and spring. &nbsp;The vavle opens when pressure is applied at the pilot port. &nbsp;The bellows assembly can be replaced, reducing maintenance costs and waste materials. &nbsp;The valve body is hard anodized A6063 aluminum, with 304 stainless steel valves and bellows. &nbsp;Numerous seal materials are available for a wide range of chmical compatibility.</p>

breadCrumb.name: XLA, Aluminum High Vacuum Angle Valve, Normally Closed/Bellows Seal
